thread.title: Anti-Trump Protesters Spit on 2 Gold Star Family Members at Veterans Ball

author: John Falkenberg
title: Anti-Trump Protesters Spit on 2 Gold Star Family Members at Veterans Ball

organizations.name: veterans ball obama gets low approval numbers

text:
Obama Gets Low Approval Numbers from U.S. Military Troops 
“The thing we couldn’t believe was the hate in these people’s eyes. They were looking at us with such hatred and they had no idea who we were,” she said. 
Manion founded the Travis Manion Foundation after her brother was killed in Iraq 10 years ago, according to WTXF . Looney’s husband was killed in Afghanistan. Advertisement - story continues below 
When the women left the event, according to Manion the protesters returned to them and renewed the assault. 
“A man came up, he’s wearing a mask and he kind of chest-bumped me from the back,” she said, “and I banged into Amy and then a group of women came up and got right in our faces and started screaming obscenities not just in our face but (at) a little boy that was walking by with his grandmother. They crouched down and got right in his face.” 
You can see the original post here: 
That’s all coming from men and women upset because of the divisiveness President Donald Trump supposedly brings to this nation. 
Give me a break.
